name: Bugs In, Sludge Out: Production Circuits As Composable Game Loop
description: This session will introduce This Cursed Machine, a sci-fi body horror fulfillment center simulator where players produce materials by connecting together a variety of machines. By constructing a graph of transformations, we introduce a digital physics built on composable logic.

speakers.name: Agnes Cameron
speakers.bio: Agnes Cameron is a hardware and software engineer and artist based in London, UK. Much of her work explores forms of distributed intelligence and co-operation. She works as a lecturer and specialist technician at University of the Arts London's Creative Computing Institute, and as a technical consultant to artists, game design studios and innovation researchers.

speakers.name: ARB
speakers.bio: ARB is the co-founder of Moving Castles, a game design studio researching and developing Autonomous Worlds. He is working on the games This Cursed Machine and Network States.
